theme: Professional B2B SaaS for user research, modern, data-driven, trustworthy, clean interfaces with subtle data visualizations.
target_audience: UX researchers and product managers in tech companies seeking efficient user research tools.

icon_system.color_usage: Inherit from parent or use theme colors

when_to_generate: Illustrative examples for synthetic research scenarios
style_preferences: Blue and green color palette integration

imagery.prompt_template: Professional illustration of [subject] for user research tool, modern clean style, blue (#3b82f6) and green (#10b981) tones, data-driven aesthetic, [aspect ratio]

primary.classes: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg font-medium
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, main actions like 'Generate Report'

secondary.classes: bg-white hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-900 px-6 py-3 rounded-lg transition-all duration-300 transform hover:scale-105 shadow-lg border border-slate-200 font-medium

base.classes: bg-white shadow-md rounded-xl p-6 transition-all duration-300

interactive.classes: bg-white shadow-md rounded-xl p-6 hover:-translate-y-1 hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-300 cursor-pointer

navigation.container: glass shadow-md fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50

forms.input: w-full px-4 py-3 rounded-lg border border-slate-300 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-200 transition-all outline-none bg-white
forms.label: block text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 mb-2

design_rationale.color_choices: Blue (#3b82f6) for trust and professionalism inspired by Stripe and UserInterviews; emerald (#10b981) for success and data insights from Dscout; purple accent (#8b5cf6) for modern data viz touches. Neutrals ensure clean, readable interfaces.
design_rationale.typography_choice: Inter selected for its modern readability and widespread use in B2B SaaS like Stripe, ensuring consistency and accessibility.
design_rationale.icon_strategy: Lucide library chosen for its comprehensive, stroke-based icons suitable for UI elements in research tools; easy integration and customization with theme colors.
design_rationale.imagery_approach: As a web app, minimal imagery focused on generated illustrations for personas and examples to maintain clean, data-driven focus; icons and charts prioritized for efficiency.
design_rationale.effects_rationale: Subtle glassmorphism and shadows create depth without overwhelming clean interfaces; smooth transitions enhance usability in data-heavy dashboards, drawing from modern SaaS patterns in references.
